channel.title: POWERCRAFT|factions|shops|mob arena|+ more!| sc28.servercraft.co:2149
channel.description:
A survival server with factions and an economy, set up shops repair your items, lock your chests and doors and set homes to teleport to and from, be safe with our grief protected server and build you faction, house and wealth and have a round or two in the Mob Arena.
LOOKING TO SETUP COMMUNITY OF A GOOD BUNCH OF PLAYERS RESPECTFUL OF THE GAME AND EACH OTHER.
sc28.servercraft.co:2149
End resets every day. Blacksmith to repair items including enchants. Build you own shop in the Shoppingmall. Griefers will be rolled back and banned straight up.
Plugins: iConomy, Mob Arena, Lockchest, Blacksmith, Chestshop. Additional Details New map, NO GRIEFERS.
